summary: No more harvesting! Removes the ability to harvest flora.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description:[/b]
Removes the ability to harvest flora, such as thistle or mountain flowers. So now they're purely cosmetic. Why, you may ask? Because, I like frolicking through fields of cabbages without "Harvest Cabbage" all over my screen.

[b]Installation:[/b]
Place the esp in your Data folder. Make sure it's loaded before any other mods that affects anything listed below.

[b]Currently changes:[/b]
-Mountain Flower
-Cabbage
-Canis Root
-Deathbell
-Dragon's Tongue
-Hanging Moss
-Jazbay
-Juniper
-Lavender
-Leek
-Nightshade
-Potato Plant
-Snowberry
-Spiky Grass
-Thistle
-Tundra Cotton
-Wheat
-Gourds
-Birds' Nest
-Charred Skeever
-Egg Sacs
-Chickens' Nest
-Clam
-Salmon
-Sap Spout
-Creep Cluster
-Giant Lichen
-Fly Amanita
-Bleeding Crown
-White Cap
-Imp stool
-Namira's Rot
-Blisterwort
-Swamp Fungal Pod
-Glowing Mushrooms
-Dried Elves Ear
-Dried Frost Mirriam
-Garlic Braid
-Pheasant
-Rabbit
-Mammoth Cheese
-Nordic Barnacle Cluster
-Slaughterfish Egg Nest
-Scaly Pholiota
-Mora Tapinella
-Bee
-Dragonfly
-Blue Butterfly
-Luna Moth
-Monarch Butterfly
-Silverside Perch
-Abacean Logfin
-River Betty
-Cyrodilic Spadetail
-Histcarp
-Geode Vein
-Corundum Ore Vein
-Gold Ore Vein
-Iron Ore Vein
-Malachite Ore Vein
-Moonstone Ore Vein
-Orichalcum Ore Vein
-Quicksilver Ore Vein
-Silver Ore Vein

[b]Dragonborn Version:[/b]
-Trama Root
-Creep Cluster
-Pearl Oyster
-Ash Yam
-Emperor Parasol Moss
-Scathecraw
-Spiky Grass
-Stalhrim Deposit
-Heart Stone Deposit

This should be everything. If I missed something, please let me know.


Also available on the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=194499965]Steam Workshop[/url].
author: knightspk2
